QueryList.Query: FROM HouseInfo A WHERE 1=1 <#if address??> <#if like??> and A.address=%:address% #else> and A.address=:address </#if> </#if> <#if id??> <#if like??> and A.id=%:id% #else> and A.id=:id </#if> </#if> <#if remark??> <#if like??> and A.remark=%:remark% #else> and A.remark=:remark </#if> </#if> <#if status??> <#if like??> and A.status=%:status% #else> and A.status=:status </#if> </#if> <#if master??> <#if like??> and A.master=%:master% #else> and A.master=:master </#if> </#if> <#if title??> <#if like??> and A.title=%:title% #else> and A.title=:title </#if> </#if> <#if price??> <#if like??> and A.price=%:price% #else> and A.price=:price </#if> </#if> <#if facility??> <#if like??> and A.facility=%:facility% #else> and A.facility=:facility </#if> </#if> <#if traffic??> <#if like??> and A.traffic=%:traffic% #else> and A.traffic=:traffic </#if> </#if> <#if image??> <#if like??> and A.image=%:image% #else> and A.image=:image </#if> </#if> <#if area??> <#if like??> and A.area=%:area% #else> and A.area=:area </#if> </#if> <#if latitude??> <#if like??> and A.latitude=%:latitude% #else> and A.latitude=:latitude </#if> </#if> <#if longitude??> <#if like??> and A.longitude=%:longitude% #else> and A.longitude=:longitude </#if> </#if> <#if count??> <#if like??> and A.count=%:count% #else> and A.count=:count </#if> </#if> <#if bed??> <#if like??> and A.bed=%:bed% #else> and A.bed=:bed </#if> </#if> <#if pledge??> <#if like??> and A.pledge=%:pledge% #else> and A.pledge=:pledge </#if> </#if>
